metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11529 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: VideoLAN VLC media player 2.2.x is prone to a use after free vulnerability which an attacker can leverage to execute arbitrary code via crafted MKV files. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial of service conditions. It was discovered that VLC mishandled certain crafted MKV files. An attacker could use this vulnerability to cause a denial of service (crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: vlc package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.3-1-1ubuntu1').
